author: The Guardian
title: Ground News - Weather tracker: rain batters Argentina and DRC as fog shrouds India and Pakistan
text:
Summary by The Guardian Turkey also affected by fog, with 10 killed and 57 injured in serious road crash involving three busesDuring the Christmas period, parts of South America experienced intense showers and thunderstorms, resulting in substantial rainfall in various regions. On Monday, more than 100mm of rain fell in the Catamarca province in Argentina, which led to flash floods. A sudden surge in river water levels then caused the collapse of a pedestrian bridge, w… Share menu More
